contest-event.event-date:
Dec. 3, 1977 D Edinburgh Charities Contest
Edinburgh Charities Contest 0 Other
edinburgh-charities-contest
Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Usher Hall, Edinburgh, City of Edinburgh, Scotland, UK Best section 2 band - Newtongrange. Best sectioon 3 band - Loudon. Best section 4 band -Bathgate. British Bandsman reports this contest as Edinburgh Charities, but British Mouthpiece reports it as Glasgow Charities. 34 bands competed.
Sept. 7, 2013, 7:34 a.m. Nov. 27, 2014, 2:58 p.m.
1 Clydebank Burgh Band Nigel Boddice
2 Bo'ness and Carriden Band David Richardson
3 Kirkintilloch Band David James
4 Newmains Unknown
4 Unison Kinneil Band Unknown
Unknown Result Bathgate Band Unknown
Unknown Result Irvine Valley Brass Jack Malpass
Unknown Result Newtongrange Band Unknown
